assessment_questions.title: Box Model Practical Assessment 1
assessment_questions.description: Style the announcement box with a border, padding, and centered text.
assessment_questions.hint: Notice how padding makes space inside the box, and margin centers the announcement box.

assessment_questions.title: Box Model Practical Assessment 2
assessment_questions.description: Create a colorful badge using background, border, and padding.
assessment_questions.hint: Observe the use of border-radius for pill shape, padding for space inside, and display property for inline-block shape.

assessment_questions.title: Box Model Practical Assessment 3
assessment_questions.description: Give the image container a fixed size, padding, and a shadow.
assessment_questions.hint: Use width/height for the box, border/border-radius for outline and corners, and padding for inner spacing.

assessment_questions.title: Box Model Practical Assessment 4
assessment_questions.description: Style a simple menu button with different sizes, colors, and box-sizing.
assessment_questions.hint: Box-sizing: border-box is used so that padding and border are included in the width/height.

assessment_questions.title: Box Model Practical Assessment 5
assessment_questions.description: Create a side panel with a thick border on one side and extra margin.
assessment_questions.hint: Pay attention to margin-left for spacing, border-left for thickness, and border-radius for rounded panel edges.
